item.description:
Every Wednesday is Pathfinder Society at The Game Den (16 Cutler Street Warren, RI 02885).

Pathfinder Society is a game you make your character, sign up on Paizo, and wherever there is a Pathfinder Society game you can play (Country and World wide). Each event is a one shot adventure and your character levels up every 3 adventures. http://paizo.com/path...

Good time, good people and you'll get a complete an adventure every week!

Again this is Everyone Wednesday, so it is a continuous event and is a The Game Den (16 Cutler Street Warren, RI).
item.name: Pathfinder Society
